name: datasketches
abstract: approximate algorithms for big data analysis

cpc_sketch.abstract: CPC sketch for approximate distinct counting

theta_sketch.abstract: Theta sketch for approximate distinct counting with set operations

aod_sketch.abstract: Specialized Tuple sketch with an array of double values associated with each key

hll_sketch.abstract: HLL sketch for approximate distinct counting

kll_float_sketch.abstract: KLL quantiles sketch for approximating distributions of float values (quanitles, ranks, histograms)

kll_double_sketch.abstract: KLL quantiles sketch for approximating distributions of double values (quanitles, ranks, histograms)

req_float_sketch.abstract: REQ (Relative Error Quantiles) sketch for approximating distributions of float values (quanitles, ranks, histograms)

frequent_strings_sketch.abstract: frequent items sketch for approximate computation of the most frequent strings

quantiles_double_sketch.abstract: Quantiles sketch for approximating distributions of double values (quanitles, ranks, histograms), superseded by KLL sketch, included to support legacy sketch data from other platforms
